item.title: We're moving into level 3 - what does that mean for you?
item.description:
The countdown is well and truly on - there are only a few hours until we move from level 4 restrictions to level 3.
So what does that mean for you? What are we allowed to do? Read on!
Can I leave ...
item.author: newsfeeds@nzherald.co.nz

enclosure.url: https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202018/IMG_2066_70x70.jpg?media_subtype_id=16|caption=Lockdown rules are about to ease - so what are we allowed to do? Photo / File

https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202016/A_050420NZHSURF5_70x70.jpg?media_subtype_id=16|caption=Police patrolling Piha on April 5 during the level 4 lockdown. Surfers defying the lockdown were issued tickets. Photo / Alex Burton

https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202016/A_050420NZHSURF8_70x70.jpg?media_subtype_id=16|caption=Surfers are spoken to and issued tickets by the police at Piha beach on April 5 during lockdown. Photo / Alex Burton

https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202016/SCCZEN_A_120217WCBRCKFC01_70x70.jpg?media_subtype_id=16|caption=You will be able to pick up a Zinger Burger or a snack box from KFC under alert level 3.
https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202016/83855102_m_70x70.jpg?media_subtype_id=16|caption=You will be able to go for a day tramp as long as it's easy and you can do it safely.

https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202016/83421425_m_70x70.jpg?media_subtype_id=16|caption=Schools will be open in alert level 3 but attendance will be optional and you should keep your child distance learning at home if possible.
https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202016/88451225_m_70x70.jpg?media_subtype_id=16|caption=Life will start to look a little more normal with some takeaway coffees back on the menu.

https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202016/dontdrive_70x70.png?media_subtype_id=16|caption=Yes you can drive to the beach in alert level 3, but make it your local not your favourite on the other side of the North Island
https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202016/132554975_m_70x70.jpg?media_subtype_id=16|caption=How you might consider your alert level 3 bubble to look.

item.title: Revealed: The massive NZ store planned by world's second biggest retailer
item.description:
